name: No Man's Gun
description:
The game

No Man's Gun sheds a light on the topic of identity loss.  It's an game about separation, finding one's own path, and connection. 

Not really. Train your reflexes and reach the goal before the time runs out. Compete with your friends for the best times and highest scores.

State of the game

This is a proof-of-concept build - the game is still under development. 

This game is optimised for Andriod - download the APK file and play it on your phone for the best experience.

A desktop build is available and has been tested but is not the intended mode of playing. An iOS build may be added in the future.

You can provide feedback and new ideas by leaving your comment below or selecting 'Give Feedback' in the main menu.

Features

No Man's Gun features:

  • 15 gripping time-trial challenges
  • Online leaderboards
  • 3 tracks of AI-created background music
  • A ghost showing your best run so far
  • A very brief tutorial
  • That's about it, really...

But... why?

Drunk on fame after his triple A success 'Samurai Sören', the developer wanted to montise on his past glory by churning out mutiple cheap games in quick succession. This is one of them.
